#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int  n, k, m;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t-->0)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &n, &k, &m);
        if( m <= n )
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        float result = log(m/n)/log(k) ;
        
        printf("%d\n", (int)result);



    }
    return 0;

}
